title: How to Style a Receding Hairline | AXE | Instagroom
description:
Adrian doesn’t hide his recedo, he owns it. This is his typical styling. 

THE TOOLS:
AXE Urban Messy Look Flexible Paste

THE STEPS:
1. Towel dry
2. Rub paste
3. Mess it up

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: I quite like my receding hairline. You just gotta wear it right. So in the morning I start with towel dried hair. I take a scoop of paste and I rub it in so it kinda warms it up. And I put it in my hair. And I just play with it until it looks good. Yeah, own it!
